data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: The accountant was a small almost mousy man, with grey hair and horn-rimmed glasses. Aptly ____, ____ was ____ by ____, ____ spent ____ days ____ in ____. Although ____ when ____ ended ____ days, he ____ also ____ with ____. As he laid in bed, he looked forward to the prospect of another day of numbers.
data.partBlankContent: The accountant was a small almost mousy man, with grey hair and horn-rimmed glasses. Aptly eno___, h_ was fasci_____ by num____, a__ spent h__ days engr_____ in spread______. Although we___ when h_ ended h__ days, he w__ also fil___ with satisf______. As he laid in bed, he looked forward to the prospect of another day of numbers.
data.answer: 会计是个身材矮小、几乎有点胆小的人，头发灰白，戴着一副角质框的眼镜。不出所料，他对数字着迷，整天埋头于电子表格。虽然一天结束时他感到疲惫，但他也感到心满意足。他躺在床上，期待着又一天的数字。
